doc:
Allan Lurie https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Allan_Lurie 0 Allan Lurie (July 25, 1923 – March 10, 2015) was an American voice actor. He was also known as Al Laurie and Bert Stewart. He was the father of Peter Lurie, also a voice actor. Allan_Lurie ( July_25_,_1923 – March_10_,_2015 ) was an_American_voice_actor . He was_also_known as Al_Laurie and Bert_Stewart . He was the_father of Peter_Lurie , also a_voice_actor .
